ISSUE.TITLE: New "Sales summary" report
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Let's add a new report to admin area > reports. It'll be the first report in this menu list. So it'll display total orders summary the following way: Available filters: The first column: 1. Start date 2. End date 3. Order status 4. Payment status The second column: 5. Category 6. Manufacturer 7. Billing country All of them will be the same as currently available at /Admin/Report/Bestsellers 8. Product. The same one as currently available at /Admin/Order/List One more field below will be the "Group by" dropdownlist. This one is actually not a filter. It'll have three options. "Day" (the default one), "Week", "Month". When the "Search" button is clicked, then we'll display the following results in the grid (columns): 1. Summary. When the "Group by" is set to "Day" it'll display a list of dates for a selected period (start/end date). For example, "Nov 8th, 2020", "Nov 7th, 2020", etc. When the "Group by" is set to "Week", it'll display a list of weeks (e.g. "December 7th, 2020 - December 12th, 2020", etc). . When the "Group by" is set to "Month", it'll display a list of months (e.g. "December 2020", "November 2020, etc). 2. Number of orders. For example, 5 3. Profit - similar to the "Summary" block at the orders page. For example, $1444.00 4. Shipping - similar to the "Summary" block at the orders page 5. Tax - similar to the "Summary" block at the orders page 6. Order total - similar to the "Summary" block at the orders page
